TextView.android:text: ConnectBot is a simple, powerful, open-source Secure Shell (SSH) client for your Android device.
It can manage several SSH sessions, create secure tunnels, and copy/paste between other apps.
You can view the full text at http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt
